Hi everyone! I've seen a few posts about terraria lately and they got me wondering, How many people here actually play Terraria?

SO!

this is like Endersmens Boy Scout thread, post your Terraria IGN and country you live in and i'll add you to the list, e.g. "America, Kozak" (Kozak is my terraria name)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-06T13:16:42Z" title="07/06/2015 01:16  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 6, 2015</time> by Kozak**

Oh I wish I played Terraria. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

It's on my mental to-get list.

Terraria fanatic here! I used to play the game a lot back in 1.1 and really enjoyed building [stuff](http://www.terrariaonline.com/threads/something-youve-probably-never-seen-before.90008/). After that, I put the game down for a while, but I'm now really getting back into it with 1.3 and expert mode. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Steam name: Don "Newton" Quixote

Country: Murica'
I bought the game, it's cool, but it's way too hard. I prefer Minecraft. (For the gameplay, not the community.)

Sorry, but when I read "...I'll add you...", I always come to think of my steam name... Which begs the question, you can add people with Terraria IGNs? Is that a new feature or something?

Anyways, I have a lot of Terraria IGNs, but the one I'm using right now is "Old Man Jeb".

Bought a boxed copy a good while ago, literally just before they announced they were finished updating the game (the first time they announced they were done.)

I've sunk a few hundred hours into it, I go back for a while every major update for a look.

Never bothered with multiplayer though.

IGN: Miki

Country: Hungary

Btw, "America" is not a country. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)can't find popcorn : (

I mean pre-Hardmode Skeletron on Expert. Even with molten armor, he is freaking impossible. One needs to be amazing or have at least 2 other people for respawning. He has undodgeable skulls that do a ton of damage. Once his arms are dead, and he is practically invincible once his arms are destroyed.

By the way, luminite is now the best ore. And one can farm chlorophyte, as it spreads. Just use weapons from the Martian Invasion after Plantera.
